articles.title: CPRK Spokesman Hits at S. Korean Unification Minister's Anti-DPRK Remarks
articles.content:
CPRK Spokesman Hits at S. Korean Unification Minister's Anti-DPRK Remarks
						
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- Hong Yong Phyo, newly-appointed minister of Unification of south Korea, in his inaugural speech on Mar. 16 pulled up the DPRK, talking about "nuclear development", "military and verbal provocation" and "preconditions for dialogue." He even shielded the "Committee for Preparations for Unification", a plot-breeding body for "unification by absorption", stating that the ministry of Unification would closely cooperate with it.
					 At a confirmation hearing on Mar. 11 he blustered that the "the May 24 step is still needed to force the north to take a responsible measure", "it is the basic stand of the 'government' neither to tolerate the nukes of the north nor to recognize it as a nuclear weapons state", and "it is necessary to cope with possibilities of contingency in the north."
					
					 A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) Wednesday gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA in this regard:
					
					 Hong Yong Phyo's remarks fully revealed the south Korean regime's foul intention to intensify its scheme for "unification of social systems" and "unification by absorption" while persisting in the vicious policy of confrontation with the fellow countrymen that pushed the north-south relations into a catastrophe.
					
					 Hong is an anti-reunification and confrontation maniac as he invented the "policy toward the north" of the present regime such as "confidence-building process on the Korean Peninsula", dancing to the tune of the chief of Chongwadae.
					
					 He, known as a "confidant of President Park Geun Hye", is now promoted to the head of the ministry of Unification, censured as "ministry for confrontation with fellow countrymen" and "ministry against reunification." So, it goes without saying that the ministry of Unification will be reduced to a more faithful mouthpiece of Chongwadae.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that Hong, if he fails to keep controlling his tongue, unaware of his position, will face a more miserable end than his predecessors who had been ridiculed as they got hell-bent only on confrontation, parroting the chief executive's remarks, and consequently failed to have any dialogue with the DPRK.
					
					 He had better learn how to control his tongue before anything else, if he does not want to follow in the wake of his disgraceful predecessors.

articles.title: Reception Given to Mark Anniversary of DPRK-Russia Agreement
articles.content:
Reception Given to Mark Anniversary of DPRK-Russia Agreement 
						
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association Thursday hosted a reception at Okryu Restaurant on the occasion of the 66th anniversary of the conclusion of the agreement on economic and cultural cooperation between the DPRK and the Russian Federation.
					 Present on invitation were Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Present there were Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the same committee who doubles as chairman of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association, Ri Kwang Gun, vice-minister of External Economic Relations, Kim In Bom, vice-minister of Culture who doubles as director-general of the General Bureau of Films, and other officials concerned.

articles.title: Sci-tech Presentation in Field of Forestry Held
articles.content:
Sci-tech Presentation in Field of Forestry Held
						
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- A sci-tech presentation in the field of forestry was held at the Grand People's Study House on March 18 and 19 to facilitate the forest restoration campaign. It was sponsored by the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					 Present there were scientists, technicians, teachers and researchers and officials of Kim Il Sung University, the Academy of Forestry of the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection, the State Academy of Sciences, Pyongyang University of Architecture, Wonsan University of Agriculture, Forestry Science Institutes in Jagang and Ryanggang provinces and Forestry Management Stations in different cities and counties.
					
					 The participants heard papers making scientific and theoretical clarifications of issues in raising trees of good species and widely propagating them, increasing quantity of seeds from trees of good species and matters of putting sapling production on a scientific, industrial and intensive basis and decisively boosting the rate of rooting of saplings.
					
					 Also presented were papers on the research achievements conducive to creating and conserving forests.

articles.title: Technology of Mass-propagating Virus-Free Crops Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Technology of Mass-propagating Virus-Free Crops Developed in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang Agricultural College of Kim Il Sung University has recently developed a new technology of mass-propagating virus-free crops in a short period by means of tissue culture.
					 The college also succeeded in making nutrient solution.
					
					 The new technology has already proved effectiveness in different farms.

articles.title: Spring Land Management Campaign Begins in DPRK
articles.content:
Spring Land Management Campaign Begins in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- A spring campaign for land management began in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Nurseries in the country direct big efforts to cultivating good species of saplings while giving precedence to the protection of forests from harmful insects.
					
					 Steps are taken to build new roads and repair bridges and railway bridges in cities and counties.
					
					 Efforts are also paid to prevent damage from flood, drought and typhoon.
					
					 Meanwhile, works go on throughout the country to facelift streets and villages and protect marine resources.

articles.title: Intangible Heritage Registration Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Intangible Heritage Registration Brisk in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has paid deep attention to putting the nation's intangible heritages on the list of world's cultural heritages.
					 In this regard, Ro Chol Su, deputy director of the National Authority for the Protection of Cultural Heritage, told KCNA, noting that the Korean folk song "Arirang" was registered as one of the world's cultural heritages last year:
					
					 Intangible heritages include folk literature, social customs, folk games, handcraft technique and national cuisines.
					
					 True to the noble intention of supreme leader Kim Jong Un, the examination for registering different intangible national heritages of high value in cultural history is now going on in the country.
					
					 Scores of kinds of intangible heritages, believed to belong to the city of Pyongyang, have been brought to examination for this year.
					
					 Efforts are paid to creating database on the nation's intangible heritages.
					
					 Typical of Korea's many intangible heritages are the methods of making Kimchi (pickled vegetables) and national costume, the customs of enjoying the Harvest Moon Day and Ssirum (Korean wrestling).

articles.title: New Poems and Songs Created
articles.content:
New Poems and Songs Created 
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- Writers of the Central Committee of the Writers Union of Korea created more than sixty poems and songs dynamically encouraging all service personnel and people in the drive to carry out the behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and uphold the party's policies in the last 15 days.
					 Words of song "We will carry out the behests of the General to the last" reflects the faith of the army and people of the DPRK to implement his behests without fail.
					
					 Words of song "Kunja-ri Spirit guarantees victory" and a collection of poems "Country always remembers Kunja-ri" deal with the feats performed by workers in Kunja-ri in the days of the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 "Faster", "We carve out future" and other poems represent the stirring reality of the DPRK where a dynamic drive is now under way to implement and uphold the party's idea and policies.
					
					 "Let's live in the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu" and "With the party forever" and other poems clearly reflect the firm will of the army and people to advance to the last along the road indicated by the party.

articles.title: U.S. Strategy to Dominate Asia-Pacific under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Strategy to Dominate Asia-Pacific under Fire 
						
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is working hard to act ruler of Asia-Pacific in this century.
					 Taking advantage of the changing world political structure and balance of forces, the U.S. is openly seeking to dominate the world in this strategic area while styling itself the "only superpower".
					
					 Obama, during his trips to various Asian countries in April last year, was busy carrying out the Asia-Pacific strategy aimed at putting the region under the U.S. control.
					
					 In Japan he formally declared that the issue of the island disputed between China and Japan came within the sphere of application of the U.S.-Japan security pact, confirming that it was quite natural for the U.S. forces to intervene in case of military conflict between China and Japan and backing Japan's willingness to exercise the "right to collective self-defense."
					
					 The U.S. didn't conceal its scenario to put its allies under its control and encircle and contain its rivals in Eurasia by indefinitely extending the transfer of the wartime operation control.
					
					 Entering this year, the U.S. regional strategy has entered the phase of full-fledged implementation.
					
					 Early in February the Obama administration announced a new "national security strategy" to be carried out in the two years to come, the remaining tenure of its office.
					
					 The keynote of the strategy calling for "redoubled efforts for carrying out rebalancing policy" toward Asia-Pacific is to carry out the regional policy with its further bolstered military muscle to meet the main interests of the U.S.
					
					 U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry at a hearing of the International Relations Committee of the U.S. House of Representatives for examining the budget plan for fiscal 2016 held on Feb. 25 said that a budget amounting to 1.4 billion dollars was shaped pursuant to the pivot to Asia policy of the present U.S. administration.
					
					 The U.S. Department of Defense clarified that it would carry out a construction plan in the region, the biggest-ever since the end of World War II, as part of the enforcement of the pivot to Asia-Pacific policy. 
					
					 According to it, projects for expanding the large-scale U.S. military bases will be carried out on Guam and in Phyongthaek of south Korea and Iwakuni and Okinawa of Japan.
					
					 The U.S. keeps 60 percent of its naval force in the region on a permanent basis and deployed more than 300 warships in Pacific or 60 percent of its warships.
					
					 The U.S. Department of Defense decided to spend 8.1 billion dollars for missile defense in 2016. 
					
					 Such evermore undisguised arms buildup of the U.S. is part of the strategic steps being taken by the Obama administration to gain success in its hegemonic strategy at any cost before the end of its office as it set its pivot to Asia policy as a primary goal of its foreign policy.
					
					 The U.S. seeks a way for carrying out its aggressive Asia-Pacific strategy on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. scenario to escalate the tension on the peninsula is part of its strategy to maintain and increase its military edge in Asia-Pacific and, furthermore, dominate the world.
					
					 The U.S. often cites "nuclear threat" from the DPRK and "its provocation" as a trite pretext for covering up the nature of its strategy for dominating Asia-Pacific and justifying it.
					
					 Vincent Stewart, director of the U.S. Defense Intelligence Agency, pinpointed the DPRK and China as the countries "posing biggest threat" in Asia-Pacific and groundlessly asserted that the nukes and missiles of the DPRK, in particular, pose serious "threat" to the U.S. and its allies.
					
					 The U.S. in its "quadrennial defense strategy review report" regarded the DPRK as the "worst foe" and declared its plan to "achieve a decisive victory" over the latter by force of arms. It openly revealed its brigandish wild ambition not to tolerate the ideology and social system of the DPRK, crying out for carrying out the "strategy for positively ratcheting up pressure on it," "executing a limited war and mapping out a plan for it" and the like.
					
					 At the beginning of the year, Obama declared "additional sanctions" against the DPRK as a "presidential executive order" and cried out for "toppling" the DPRK as early as possible.
					
					 The U.S. administration made it a policy to carry out the strategy seeking "collapse" of the DPRK, which is aimed to stamp out the ideology, system and sovereignty of the latter by using all levers such as "nukes," "human rights campaign," "cyber attack" and "freedom of expression."
					
					 Heavyweights of the U.S. political camp and its military bosses are getting desperate in the moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK, ballyhooing about re-listing the DPRK as "a sponsor of terrorism" and slapping "toughest additional sanctions" against it.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korea are staging Foal Eagle war games throughout south Korea in the wake of Key Resolve aimed at "occupying Pyongyang."
					
					 All north-targeted war scenarios worked out by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers such as the plan for jointly coping with local war and tailored deterrence strategy have been applied to the war drills.
					
					 What the U.S. seeks in its war exercises for invading the DPRK is to put the whole of the Korean peninsula, a strategically important region, under its control and thus dominate the world, no matter what codename and pretext it uses for staging them.
					
					 The U.S. aggressive strategy for dominating Asia-Pacific can never work on the DPRK.
					
					 The national power and military muscle of the DPRK, a guardian of the Korean nation and peace on the Korean peninsula, can never be compared with those in the 1950s.
					
					 The DPRK will never pardon the desperate war moves of the U.S. seeking to turn the peninsula into a theater for power scramble and a theatre of war which will cause the extermination of the Korean nation but will fight a final decisive battle in the showdown with the U.S. in the 21st century, not on the peninsula but in the U.S. mainland.
					
					 If any form of war, whether it is a local war or total war or a nuclear war, breaks out due to the arrogant and misjudged scenario of the White House to ignite a new world war on the Korean peninsula, the DPRK will never miss the chance and lead it to a great war for national reunification to put an end to the U.S. history of aggression.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for All-out Forest Restoration Campaign
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for All-out Forest Restoration Campaign 
						
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- All the officials, party members and other people should turn out in the forest restoration campaign to turn the country into a people's paradise, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article. It continues:
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his work "Let the Entire Party, the Whole Army and All the People Conduct a Vigorous Forest Restoration Campaign to Cover the Mountains of the Country with Green Woods" on February 26, Juche 104 (2015) set forth the important task for forest restoration campaign and called for mobilizing all the forces and means to push forward the campaign. 
					
					 The forest restoration is an urgent task of the times which brooks no further delay. 
					
					 It is the sacred task and bounden duty for the Korean people, descendants of President Kim Il Sung and soldiers and disciples of leader Kim Jong Il to turn the country associated with their noble patriotic soul into a socialist paradise. 
					
					 The on-going campaign for forest restoration is not a mere business-like one for planting and growing trees. This is a worthwhile patriotic one to build a thriving socialist nation on this land by our efforts and resources and fierce standoff with the imperialists who are desperate to stifle the DPRK at any cost and a struggle to defend socialism. 
					
					 We should resolutely smash the vicious sanctions of the enemies by dynamically waging the forest restoration campaign and fully display the advantages and vitality of Korean-style socialism.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Authorities' Sycophancy toward U.S. and Confrontation with Compatriots
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Authorities' Sycophancy toward U.S. and Confrontation with Compatriots 
						
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- If the south Korean puppet forces rush headlong into sycophancy toward the U.S. and confrontation with compatriots, disregarding the requirements of the times and the aspiration of the fellow countrymen, they will face a stern judgment from the nation, warns Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article.
					 What they are doing is an unpardonable act of treachery contrary to the aspiration of the fellow countrymen and the requirements of the times, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The puppet authorities made much fuss about "alliance" with the U.S. in the wake of a south Korean inhabitant's knife attack on the U.S. ambassador in Seoul. This disgusting behavior sparked off the towering resentment among all Koreans.
					
					 The puppet forces' reckless action, a product of the inveterate sycophancy toward the U.S. and dependence on outsiders, is a criminal act of escalating confrontation with the compatriots by clinging to coattails of the U.S.
					
					 In actuality the puppet forces are bedeviling the inter-Korean relations and escalating tension on the Korean peninsula by cooperating with the U.S. which steps up the moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK while talking about "collapse of the north".
					
					 The tightened "alliance" with the U.S. touted by the south Korean puppet forces will only deteriorate the inter-Korean relations and spark off a war.
					
					 Their sycophancy toward the U.S. and confrontation with compatriots are a base scheme to tide over the ruling crisis and prolong their remaining days.
					
					 They are making desperate efforts to tide over the uncontrollable ruling crisis with the support and backing of the U.S., but they are miscalculating.
					
					 We will not remain a passive onlooker to the reckless moves of the U.S. and south Korean puppet warmongers bringing dark clouds of a war to hang over the Korean peninsula, indifferent to the destiny of the Korean nation.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams U.S. Human Rights Abuses
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams U.S. Human Rights Abuses
						
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- An annual average of 928 people are killed by policemen in the U.S., according to a Russian newspaper.
					 What is stunning the people is the fact that the number of those killed by policemen is 55 times that of people slain by terrorists.
					
					 Minju Joson Thursday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The most dangerous forces threatening the lives of the people in the U.S. are not terrorists but policemen who are legal killers swaggering about under the patronage of the law.
					
					 Ceaseless murder of black men by policemen clearly reveals serious human rights abuses in the U.S.
					
					 What matters is that policemen are committing such crimes at the tacit connivance of the judicial authorities and under their patronage.
					
					 Whenever people are killed by policemen, the U.S. judicial authorities are busy patronizing criminals, claiming that the murder took place due to a mistake made by their misjudgment.
					
					 Great irony is that the U.S. is pulling up other countries over their human rights issues and behaving as if it were a human rights judge, not feeling ashamed of such serious human rights abuses. 
					
					 The U.S. had better get serious about putting its own human rights abuses under control as advised by the world people.

articles.title: Minju Joson Assails Park Geun Hye Group's Fascist Crackdown
articles.content:
Minju Joson Assails Park Geun Hye Group's Fascist Crackdown 
						
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet police, taken aback by widespread leaflet scattering actions against Park Geun Hye, sent a document "regulations on punishment and guidelines on counteraction" to the principal police stations. 
					 Minju Joson Thursday says in a commentary: 
					
					 This clearly proves that the puppet police have been reduced to faithful shaggy dogs of the Park group.
					
					 The leaflet scattering actions staged in some parts of south Korea at the end of last year are being massively conducted across south Korea including Seoul, Pusan, Taegu, Inchon, Changwon of South Kyongsang Province and Kunsan of North Jolla Province. 
					
					 According to the order of the present ruling forces, much upset by these actions, the puppet police are kicking up a racket  for  gathering  leaflets, finding  out prime movers and searching houses after being promptly hurled into the scenes, but they are facing massive protest actions calling for making apology for human rights abuses and immediately stopping investigation. 
					
					 The evermore desperate moves of the present ruling forces to check the above-said actions suggest that they may hurl puppet armed forces into repressive operations just as what happened under the "yusin" dictatorship if they fail in kicking up fascist rampage with puppet police involved.
					
					  The Park group is busy sheltering and encouraging human scum's anti-DPRK leaflet scattering operations, describing them as an "expression of freedom." But it is kicking up such racket by mobilizing puppet police in a bid to check actions now under way to scatter leaflets critical of unpopular rule, sycophancy toward the U.S. and confrontation with compatriots. This only brings to light the puppet group's hypocritical nature and intention.
					
					 Fascist crackdown is neither a remedy for tiding over the crisis of the group nor means for prolonging its remaining days.

articles.title: U.S. Slammed for Moving to Deploy THAAD in S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Slammed for Moving to Deploy THAAD in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification and other civic and public organizations of south Korea held a rally before the U.S. embassy in Seoul on March 17 at which they denounced the U.S. for stepping up its moves to deploy THAAD in south Korea.
					 From the outset of the year the U.S. talked about the deployment of THAAD in south Korea and officially admitted the fact that the U.S. forces command in south Korea made a survey of the site for THAAD deployment, speakers said.
					
					 The U.S. made a survey of Phyongthaek of Kyonggi Province, Wonju of south Korean Kangwon Province and Kijang County of Pusan City but did not inform the south Korean authorities of this, they charged.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean authorities are claiming that the deployment of THAAD is aimed to cope with the "nukes and missiles of the north" but this is nonsensical and it is very unrealistic in the light of the expenses for its deployment which run into astronomical figures, they noted, and continued:
					
					 The deployment of THAAD will pose a threat to the security on this land and bring burden to the south Korean economy.
					
					 They strongly denounced the U.S. for pushing forward its moves to deploy THAAD for achieving its military purpose and realizing its ambition for hegemony.

articles.title: Abrogation of Evil Law on Human Rights Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Abrogation of Evil Law on Human Rights Demanded in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet Jonju District Court held a trial of Rev. Han Sang Ryol, a pro-reunification champion, on March 16 on charge of the violation of the draconian "law on supervision for public peace", according to Chamsesang, an internet paper of south Korea.
					 The puppet security authorities threw him behind bars on charges of the violation of the "Security Law" for the mere reason that he visited the DPRK in 2010 without permission. After his release they rearrested him in August last year, claiming that he did not inform police of his movements, subject to supervision for public peace. But they set him free under the public pressure.
					
					 The puppet prosecution indicted him without detention in December last year and finally held a trial of him.
					
					 The Catholic Priests' Council for Justice, the North Jolla Provincial Solidarity for Peace and Human Rights and other civic and public organizations in the province held a press conference outside the Jonju District Court building.
					
					 Speakers at the press conference said that the "law on supervision for public peace" is an evil law which copied the "order for the probation of Korean political offenders" enforced by the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 They demanded the repeal of the fascist law for suppressing people's thoughts and abusing human rights.

articles.title: Japanese Organization Denounces U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
Japanese Organization Denounces U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises
						
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The Japanese National Liaison Council of Societies for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism made public a statement on Mar. 12 in denunciation of the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises kicked off by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime started Key Resolve and Foal Eagle on Mar. 2.
					
					 It was reported that the drills involve not only three services of the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces but also troops of Britain, France, Australia and Canada.
					
					 The dangerous war moves by the U.S. are creating a touch-and-go situation to the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korea are describing the drills as "defensive" and "annual" ones but this is no more than a camouflage to cover up their scheme to mount a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK.
					
					 U.S. President Obama openly declared that the U.S. policy is aimed to deny the ideology of the DPRK and "collapse" its socialist system.
					
					 Herein lies the aggressive and reactionary intention of the war exercises.
					
					 We resolutely oppose the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills, with the stand to learn from the Juche idea and turn Japan into an independent and peaceful country.
					
					 The Japanese government, being involved in the U.S. war moves, should make a switchover in its hostile policy toward the DPRK at an early date, establish friendly relations with it and make efforts for peace in Asia.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by German Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by German Organization
						
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany posted on its website an article titled "Banner of independence indicates road to be taken by humankind" (1. Origin of Juche idea) on March 13 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Noting that the President founded the Juche idea, the article said:
					
					 He convened the Kalun Meeting in 1930, at which he made a historic report "The Path of the Korean Revolution."
					
					 In the report he clarified the truth that the Korean people are the master of the Korean revolution and the revolution should be carried out by them, as required by the specific conditions of Korea.
					
					 The essence of the Juche idea is that the master of the revolution and construction is the popular masses as they have the strength to accelerate the revolution and construction.
					
					 The President made great efforts to strictly apply the Juche idea to all fields of the revolution and construction.
					
					 He accomplished the historic cause of national liberation and successfully steered the two-stage social revolution and socialist construction.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il developed the Juche idea into an integral system, formulated it into Kimilsungism and ceaselessly developed it.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un has formulated the revolutionary ideas of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il into Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and added glory to them.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Carried by Egyptian Magazine
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Carried by Egyptian Magazine
						
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- A gist of Marshal Kim Jong Un's New Year address was carried by the February issue of the Egyptian magazine "Agricultural Worker."
					 It was illustrated with his photo.

articles.title: Nigerian Body Introduces Pyongyang Folklore Park
articles.content:
Nigerian Body Introduces Pyongyang Folklore Park
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism introduced the Pyongyang Folklore Park in its article titled "Place where national history spanning 5 000 years is alive" posted on its website on Mar. 10.
					 The park showcasing the time-honored history of the Korean nation was built in the vast area at the foot of Mt. Taesong in Pyongyang, the article said, and went on:
					
					 The park consists of the general historical education area, historic relics exhibition area, contemporary times area, folklore village area, folklore games area and other areas. Visitors can see in actual size or miniature cultural remains and relics and modern creatures made by the Korean nation in diverse periods.
					
					 Visual aid boards in the park clearly show the Korean nation's history spanning five thousand years from the primitive age to the modern age, helping visitors get easy understanding of the territories held by the ancient states of Korea when they were strong, founding fathers, patriotic generals, famous personages and anti-aggression struggles, scientific and cultural activities and peculiar national customs in relevant periods.
					
					 In the contemporary times area one can get a view of Mt. Paektu the Korean nation regards as the ancestral mountain.
					
					 Mt. Paektu is the holy place of the revolution where President Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea, waged the anti-Japanese struggle to retake the usurped country.
					
					 Those who visit the contemporary times area can also see Jong Il Peak shining with the august name of Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il and his birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp.
					
					 There are also miniatures of monumental edifices built by the Korean people under the guidance of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The park helps all visitors know about the glorious history of the Korean nation.

articles.title: Nigerian Organization Marks Anniversary of KNA
articles.content:
Nigerian Organization Marks Anniversary of KNA
						
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article titled "Aim High" on its website on Mar. 11 on the occasion of the 98th anniversary of the Korean National Association (KNA).
					 The article said:
					
					 "Aim High" means one should have far-reaching intention. This represents the profound idea that one should achieve independence of the country at any cost through the struggle generation after generation and build a new society where the people have become its master.
					
					 Kim Hyong Jik, an outstanding leader of the Korean anti-Japanese national liberation movement, advanced this idea.
					
					 He performed distinguished feats in the anti-Japanese national liberation movement.
					
					 On the basis of detailed preparations, he formed the KNA, the largest anti-Japanese underground revolutionary organization most transparent in independent stand against imperialism at that time, on March 23, 1917.
					
					 The KNA was a secret association aimed to achieve the independence of the country and build a highly civilized state by the concerted efforts of the entire Korean nation.
					
					 The article introduced in detail the fact that he played a pivotal role in changing the course of the anti-Japanese national liberation movement from the nationalist movement to the proletarian revolution.

articles.title: Portavoz de CRPP denuncia disparate anti-RPDC de Hong Yong Phyo
articles.content:
Portavoz de CRPP denuncia disparate anti-RPDC de Hong Yong Phyo
						
Pyongyang, 19 de marzo (ACNC) -- El pasado dia 16, Hong Yong Phyo, nombrado como nuevo ministro de Unificacion del Sur de Corea, en su discurso de la toma de posesion, acuso perversamente la RPDC de "desarrollo de armas nucleares" y "provocacion militar y de palabras". Insatisfecho con presentar la "premisa de dialogo", amparo el "comite preparatorio de unificacion", aparato intrigante para la "unificacion mediante absorcion" abogando por la cooperacion estrecha con ese comite.
					En la audiencia de personal efectuada el dia 11, disparateo que el "problema de medidas del 24 de mayo es el que se necesita imponer al Norte (de Corea) a tomar las medidas responsables" y que "la posicion de su 'gobierno' es no tolerar las armas nucleares del Norte ni reconocer a este como pais poseedor de ese artefacto". Y anadio que "hay que hacer frente a varias posibilidades relativas al estado de emergencia del Norte".
					
					En su respuesta dada el dia 18 a la pregunta de un reportero de la ACNC, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria condeno que las palabras de Hong pusieron al desnudo su malsana intencion de seguir recurriendo a la politica de confrontacion fratricida que llevo a la fase catastrofica las relaciones intercoreanas y de perseguir mas abiertamente la ilusion de lograr la "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes" y la "unificacion segun la absorcion", y prosiguio:
					
					Hong es un maniaco anti-reunificacion que invento la "politica sobre el Norte" del actual "gobierno", tales como el "proceso de confianza de la Peninsula Coreana" adhiriendose a las maniobras de confrontacion fratricida de la duena de Chongwadae.
					
					Esta vez, Hong, reconocido como "sirviente de la presidenta", tomo el cargo de la cabecilla del Ministerio de Unificacion condenado como "ministerio de confrontacion fratricida" y "el de anti-reunificacion". Por esta razon, no cabe duda que el Ministerio de Unificacion se convierta mas en trompetero venal de Chongwadae.
					
					Si no controla su boca, Hong sera mas miserable que sus predecesores quienes fueron condenados sin lograr debidamente las conversaciones con la RPDC.
					
					Si no quiere repetir el fracaso de sus antecedentes, Hong deberia controlar bien su boca y aprender primero el modo de hablar.

articles.title: Ofrecido banquete por 66o aniversario de acuerdo sobre cooperacion RPDC-FR
articles.content:
Ofrecido banquete por 66o aniversario de acuerdo sobre cooperacion RPDC-FR 
						
Pyongyang, 19 de marzo (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 66o aniversario de concertacion del Acuerdo sobre la Cooperacion Economica y Cultural entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Federacion Rusa, el Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero  y la Asociacion de Amistad Corea-Rusia ofrecieron el dia 19 un banquete en el Restaurante Okryu.
					Fueron invitados el embajador Alexandr Matsegora y otros miembros de la sede diplomatica rusa en Corea.
					
					Estuvieron presentes la presidenta del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero Kim Jong Suk, el vicepresidente de la misma entidad y presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad Corea-Rusia Kim Jin Bom, el viceministro de Relaciones Economicas con el Extranjero Ri Kwang Gun, el viceministro de Cultura y director general de Filmes Kim In Bom y otros funcionarios.

articles.title: Tiene lugar presentacion cientifico-tecnica nacional de la rama de selvicultura
articles.content:
Tiene lugar presentacion cientifico-tecnica nacional de la rama de selvicultura
Pyongyang, 19 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar los dias 18 y 19 en el Palacio de Estudio del Pueblo la presentacion nacional cientifico-tecnica de la rama de selvicultura para la restauracion forestal bajo auspicios del Comite Central de la Federacion General de Ciencia y Tecnica de Corea.
					Participaron los cientificos, tecnicos, profesores, investigadores y funcionarios de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, la Academia de Ciencias de Selvicultura del Ministerio de Proteccion Territorial y Ambiental, la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, la Universidad de Arquitectura de Pyongyang, el Instituto Superior de Agricultura de Wonsan, los institutos de selvicultura de las provincias de Jagang y Ryanggang, los centros de gestion forestal de varias ciudades y distritos, etc.
					
					En la ocasion se presentaron las disertaciones que argumentan en lo cientifico y tecnico los problemas para cultivar y plantar los arboles de buenas especies, aumentar los bosques semilleros de buenas especies, elevar el nivel cientifico, industrial e intensivo de la produccion de posturas y mejorar la radicacion.
					
					Tambien se distinguieron las monografias que reflejan los exitos de investigacion a contribuirse a la creacion y proteccion de bosques.

articles.title: Iniciada en Corea movilizacion general para administracion territorial en estacion primaveral
articles.content:
Iniciada en Corea movilizacion general para administracion territorial en estacion primaveral
						
Pyongyang, 19 de marzo (ACNC) -- Se inicio en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea la  movilizacion general para la administracion  territorial en la estacion primaveral.
					Con el vinculo del Consejo de Ministros, los ministerios, los organos centrales, las provincias, las ciudades y distritos, el sector de proteccion territorial y ambiental trazo las metas a cumplirse durante el tiempo de la movilizacion general y moviliza a las masas a realizarla.
					
					Se desarrolla en la Almaciga Central y otras en las localidades la campana por cultivar las posturas de arboles necesarias a la recuperacion forestal.
					
					Muchas unidades siembran en las avenidas, las aldeas, los puestos de trabajo y los alrededores de las escuelas el albaricoquero, los manzanos bajos, el ciruelo y otros arboles frutales y floriferos.
					
					Se realiza de antemano la labor por establecer estrictamente el sistema de vigilancia y el aviso del incendio forestal y la movilizacion de masas y la proteccion de recursos forestales desde las plagas e insectos daninos.
					
					Las provincias, ciudades y distritos toman las medidas para construir nuevamente las carreteras y reparar generalmente los puentes y los puentes ferroviarios.
					
					Para evitar previamente los danos por la inundacion, la sequia y tifones, las regiones colindadas con rios despliegan la construccion de diques, la reparacion de presas, el dragado, la formacion de bosques a la orilla de rio, etc.
					
					Se promueven las labores por renovar radicalmente la fisonomia de las carreteras y aldeas tales como reparar y pintar las viviendas y edificios publicos, el arreglo de redes de alcantarillado y de lluvias y el acondicionamiento de parques y lugares de recreo.
					
					Se efectua la labor por proteger y multiplicar los recursos maritimos al poner en el mar las piedras y las conchas.
